titles.title: To establish a competitive grant program to support the development, implementation, and evaluation of successful teacher and school leader training programs on family engagement that will increase the capacity of teachers and school leaders to work with families to develop and support the social and emotional skills, habits, and mindsets of children.
SELF Act of 2019
SELF Act of 2019
Social Emotional Learning for Families Act of 2019
Social Emotional Learning for Families Act of 2019
Social Emotional Learning for Families Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
